title: Bug 23935 - Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets (tree and text) are children of the shell. The issue occurs only on Windows. A potential solution is to create the text editor as a sibling of the tree and move it above the tree.
OB: When you click anywhere in the tree, the tree gains focus. However, on Linux, the text widget never loses focus when you click on the tree. The text widget is a child of the tree, which leads to platform UI bug 2470.
EB: To reproduce the bug, please run the attached code using build 20020920. On Windows and Linux, the left tree and text widgets should behave correctly.
